SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Generate Config and Response file in temp directory of Agent : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "buildnodeconfig-&$RUNID#.xml") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE#,,"TASK"
! Save Contents of Config file : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_CONFIG#) : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#) : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "ERROR WRITING BUILD NODE CONFIGURATION. ERROR CODE: &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 0 ! Decrypte Password : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!-------------------------------------Create cURL command to call Teamcity REST api--------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl "
! Teamcity url : SET &UC4RB_TMC_TRIGGER_BUILD_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_URL#, "/httpAuth/app/rest/buildQueue") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_TRIGGER_BUILD_URL# : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, """&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"" ")
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "--request POST --header ""Content-Type:application/xml"" --data-binary @&UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE# --silent")
! Username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# : SET &ESC_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
!-------------------------------------Execute curl cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG# = "ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. PLEASE CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS."
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS"
echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#"
echo | set /p="UC4RB_TMC_RESP::=" &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n"
IF NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( echo "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" SET ERRORS=1 ) : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX"
echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#"
echo -n "UC4RB_TMC_RESP::="
&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n"
if [ "$?" -gt "0" ] then echo "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" errors=1 fi : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "ERROR WRITING BUILD NODE CONFIGURATION TO FILE SYSTEM. ERROR CODE: &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** TRIGGER BUILD CMD EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** TRIGGER BUILD ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# = "" :SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = "" :PSET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_TMC_RESP" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# ! If response code is not 200 we fail action : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# NE "200" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ERROR COMMUNICATING TEAMCITY." : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 ! Else if there is a response then read xml and publish build id : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP# <> "" : SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_TMC_RESP#) : IF &ROOTHND# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&ROOTHND#, "@id") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : XML_CLOSE : ELSE : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "EMPTY RESPONSE FROM TEAMCITY." : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
